soot.jimple.infoflow.rifl

Class RIFLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.rifl.RIFLWriter

  • public class RIFLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for writing out RIFL-compliant data flow policies
    Author:
    Steven Arzt
